nodes.excerpt: Ojoy enlarges low-resolution photos and memoji and improves their quality. It does this 100% in the browser client-side, thanks to some smarts from Upscaler and TensorFlow.js. The output is typically sharper compared to just resizing them.
nodes.title: Ojoy - Enlarge low-resolution images and improve their quality

nodes.excerpt: We bought likely 2024 presidential candidates URLs. We broke each URL into 100 shares that we are now selling for $1 per share. You buy shares of the URLs you want, and if we sell it you get a cut of the money.
nodes.title: In The Year 2024 - We have future presidents' domains - buy shares and get paid

nodes.excerpt: We collected 2.8m podcast connections according to the "Listeners Also Subscribed To" data in Apple Podcasts. Now you can vizualize any podcast's neighbours (and it's neighbour's neighbours) in a 3D graph and see which other podcasts share a similar audience.
nodes.title: The Podcast Audience Graph - Visualize podcast audience connections in 3D.
